snippet.title: 7Days Origins Intro
snippet.description:
This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment. 
Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test.
Everything depends on your choice.
You only have 7 days! 
And what would be your choice?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494140/7Days_Origins/
